name: Rewind - Brackeys Game Jam 2020
description:
Game made for the 2020 Brackeys Game Jam with the theme 'Rewind'!

Find your way around the city and repair the damage done by the invading robots, but be careful not to be seen!

Very short game but I thought the theme was interesting and I'm glad that the time frame wasn't super restrictive, if you do have a chance to play lemme know how it went I love getting feedback on my games!

Controls:

WASD - movement
Mouse - Look around
Left Mouse Click - activate intractable objects
Esc - Pause Game
